events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorised under the engineering department given your software development experience and skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps in the hiring process.
We conducted an initial screening interview to assess your fit for the software engineering role. Your technical background looks promising.
Thank you for your prompt response to our screening questions and for providing detailed information about your development projects.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th to further evaluate your software engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and familiarity with DevOps tools.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals, company culture fit, and benefits available for the engineering role.
Your HR interview went well, and the team is impressed with your communication skills and enthusiasm for the software engineer position.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your positive feedback regarding the job offer and for expressing your excitement to join our engineering team.
You accepted the offer to join us as a software engineer. Welcome to the team! We are excited to have you on board.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive all the necessary resources and support to integrate smoothly into the engineering department.
The hiring process for the software engineer position is now closed successfully with your official start completed.
